.. module:: photomacros

.. _photomacros:

================
Photomacros
================

This section provides an overview of the dataset and configuration files required to start the project.

.. contents::
    :local:
    :depth: 1

Config
------
The `config` module contains the necessary configuration settings for the project.

.. automodule:: photomacros.config
    :members:
    :undoc-members:
    :show-inheritance:
    :noindex:

Dataset
-------
The `dataset` module manages the raw and processed datasets.

.. automodule:: photomacros.dataset
    :members:
    :undoc-members:
    :show-inheritance:
    :noindex:

Features
--------
The `features` module provides feature extraction and processing routines.

.. automodule:: photomacros.features
    :members:
    :undoc-members:
    :show-inheritance:
    :noindex:
